content: st row 17 work row 2 of silt pattern stitch row 18 decrease row chain 3 skip 1st st dc4tog over next 4 sts 2 times *1 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 8 sts counting t-chain as 1 st dc4tog over next 4 sts dc3tog over next 3 sts skip t-chain turn = 16 22 -- -- sts counting each dc4tog or dc3tog as 1 st and the chain-3 as 1 st row 19 decrease row chain 1 2 double_crochet in 1st st skip next 3 sts 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st *skip next 2 sts 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 8 sts counting t-chain as a st skip next 3 sts 1 single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st skip next 3 sts 1 single_crochet in top of t-chain = 12 18 -- - - sts not counting chain-1 at beginning cut yarn and fasten_off jump to finishing instructions on page 5 for sizes medium and large only row 16 decrease row chain 3 skip 1st st decrease over next 2 sts 3 times *1 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 6 sts counting t-chain as 1 st decrease over next 2 sts 2 times 1 double_crochet in next st skip t-chain turn = -- -- 46 52 sts counting each decrease as 1 st and the chain-3 as 1 st row 17 work row 2 of silt pattern stitch row 18 decrease row chain 3 skip 1st st decrease over next 2 sts 9 times *1 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 18 sts counting t-chain as 1 st decrease over next 2 sts 8 times 1 double_crochet in next st skip t-chain turn = -- -- 28 34 sts counting each decrease as 1 st and the chain-3 as 1 st y page 3 of 6 swb-c00058 y  copyright sweaterbabe com all rights reserved worldwide sweaterbabe com has made every effort to be accurate and complete with our patterns they are provided strictly as is we are not responsible for differences between knitters knitting mistakes or any typographical errors our patterns are authorized for home knitting use only and are not to be knit for resale sweaterbabe com patterns may not be photocopied or distributed in any hardcopy or electronic form without the express written consent of sweaterbabe com join the sweaterbabe com knitting club for new patterns each month giveaways & expert advice your #1 website for free pattern downloads great knitting and crochet patterns a big searchable yarn shop directory and much more row 19 work row 2 of silt pattern stitch row 20 decrease row chain 3 skip 1st st dc3tog over next 3 sts 3 times *1 double_crochet in next st repeat from * to last 9 sts counting t-chain as 1 st dc3tog over next 3 sts 2 times decrease over next 2 sts skip t-chain turn = -- -- 16 22 sts
